text.div:
Radiation Therapy II

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcs
    Code Display
    77427 Radiation treatment management, 5 treatments
    77431 Radiation treatment management, 1 or 2 treatments
    77432 Stereotactic radiation treatment management of brain lesions, complete course of treatment consisting of 1 session
    77435 Stereotactic radiation treatment management of 1 or more lesions using imaging guidance, per treatment course
    77470 Special radiation treatment procedure
    77761 Application of organ cavity radiation source, simple
    77762 Application of organ cavity radiation source, intermediate
    77763 Application of organ cavity radiation source, complex
    77776 Application of radiation source, simple
    77777 Application of radiation source, intermediate
    77778 Application of radiation source, complex
    77785 High dose brachytherapy delivery, 1 channel
    77786 High dose brachytherapy delivery, 2-12 channels
    77787 High dose brachytherapy delivery, over 12 channels

name: Radiation Therapy II
publisher: American Society of Clinical Oncology Steward
